content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Ill state thast while coming home from las vegas a metalic disk lifted off a near by moutain and approached us came about half way from the mountain top and did a wing tip rool then went back from exactly where it had taken off from this lasted about 2 minutes total i had a witness my passenger  po box 553 oceanside ca i have many other encouters
content.summary: While returning from las vegas with 2 friends in car i was driving south onhwy 15 right behind the small airport close to the womens prison the disk came over the top of the mountain it came right at us and toward the freeway i looked at my friend and ask

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the poarch having a cigarette when i noticed a very bright light about 45 degrees above the horizon quite some distant away (more than 10 miles). it seemed to be pulsating or shimmering then faded/disappeared for a few seconds, then re appeared for a few more seconds before disappearing completely. the sighting lasted between 10-15 seconds.

i live under a main aircraft approach path into chicago and i am a private pilot. the object was in the area where jets heading into chicago usually are visible. i have watched hundreds of planes and this was not like any lights i have seen before. it was very bright, too bright to me to have been an aircrft landing light, especially since it was a bright sunny day around noon. i have seen many of such lights, but none have shown the chactoristics this light displayed. i have a pair of binoculars on the poarch and while i didn't think to grab them when the object was visible, after it disappeared i search the area with binoculars, as well flight path that it would have taken had it been an aircraft going to chicago and did not see anything.
content.summary: Pulsating or shimmering light. very bright.

content.detailedDescription: I dropped my sister home on slocum ave in mount airy section of philadelphia about 8:30 pm. i made a left turn onto mansfield ave. once i got to the first cross street i noticed the full moon and southeast of the moon i saw five bright circles close and somewhat sporadic still in the sky, i moved a little further and saw them in a straight line. i pulled over and snapped two pictures with my cell phone. i got a little scared because of the phone's flash. i pulled off then went home.
content.summary: I  saw 5 bright circles that were still and started moving into a differently

content.detailedDescription:
the witness was on vacation with his family (wife, 3 children - ages 10, 11, 13) in ocean city, md on july 29, 2013 and was sitting on the oceanfront balcony of his first floor hotel suite # 102 on the night of july 29, 2013, facing due east toward the atlantic ocean. (quality inn & suites, 3301 atlantic ave., ocean city md 21842, phone:  410-289-1234, fax: 410-289-0123) his wife and children were asleep inside the suite and the lights were out, except for a night light.

the witness��� position was: n 38* 21.697���   w 75* 04.263���  elevation: 20���.  

the night was clear with a minor degree of light diffusion from nearby hotels.  the moon had not yet risen and would not for several hours hence. above the horizon, due east, were occasional flashes of light, emmited by a thunderstorm occurring beyond the curvature.  several meteor streaks were observed by the witness as well as a number of commercial aircraft at standard cruising levels, before the sighting.  at approximately 10:00 - 10:15 pm the witness noticed a small orange light to the north that appeared to be quite low over the ocean surface at approximately 100 ��� 300 feet in altitude, moving in a southerly heading toward the witness at a rather rapid rate of speed.  within approximately 10 seconds, the light had reached the size of a full moon and was very bright ��� the brightness and color approximated the coloring and intensity of a setting sun.  

the witness had binoculars and focused them on the light.  with the magnification, the object appeared to be a glowing orange sphere with uniform color and brightness. the color was soft and muted and emanated from the interior of the sphere.  the sphere was pleasant and soothing to the eye. there were no other lights or visible characteristics appearing on the sphere.

the sphere was approximately 5 ��� 10 miles, north, of the witness when it reached its maximum size and it remained several hundred feet above the ocean surface.  at this point, the sphere began moving in an easterly direction, directly out to sea, and it diminished in size due to its increasing distance from the witness.  it continued on its easterly course for approximately 10 ��� 15 seconds until its size appeared to be that of a very large star.  at this point, the sphere commenced a straight climb of approximately 45* on a southerly heading.  the climb was rapid and it leveled off at approximately 10,000 feet.  it then continued straight and level on its southerly heading.  the angle of inclination of the sphere, at this point, was estimated at approximately 30*.

the sphere continued on its southerly, level course for approximately 10 seconds then turned to a south-easterly heading, in the general direction of the the thunderstorm, and continued on this course until it was no longer visible due to the increased distance from witness.

the witness continued to watch the sky for approximately 10 minutes thereafter. then, assuming the sighting had come to an end, he entered the suite and proceeded to the kitchen where he filled a bowl with caramel popcorn and returned to the balcony. the witness was absent from the balcony for approximately 5 minutes in procuring his snack.  he resumed watching the sky for any further activity.  after about 10 minutes, the witness noticed a second sphere in the same azimuth as he had initially seen the first sphere.  

his second sphere was identical to the first sphere in every respect.  it proceeded to follow the same maneuvers as did the first sphere at the same speed and altitudes.  it proceeded to the final south-easterly course and, like the first sphere, was no longer visible, after a short time, due to the increased distance from the witness.  approximately ten minutes after the second sphere's disappearance, a third sphere, identical to the first two, appeared in the same azimuth as the first two spheres and repeated the same course maneuvers, identical to the first two spheres.  this process continued, until a total of eight identical spheres observed. the sighting came to an end after the eighth sphere.  the elapsed time from beginning to end of the sighting was approximately 60 to 90 minutes.

all the spheres were silent throughout their manuevers and their speed remained constant.  all legs of the course were flown in a straight flight pattern, with no irregular movements, and at a constant velocity.  the only aspect of their maneuvering that was anomalous was that their course changes appeared to be angular in nature, while normal aircraft require a curved course to change heading because of their dependence on air pressure differentials to accomplish flight and directional control.

although the flight, velocity and climb characteristics of the spheres were unremarkable, as a former military pilot, the witness had never observed any aircraft of this appearance in the sky and had never witnessed any craft, at this close range, under precise directional control, do so in total silence.  these aspects of the sighting were, to the witness, totally anomalous to his experience.

as a former military pilot, the witness ruled out the possibility of these objects being baloons, due to their precise, controlled maneuvering and their velocity and climb characteristics.  he also ruled out the possibility of their being blimps, due to their speed and maneuvering characteristics and, also, their physical appearance.
content.summary: Witnessed 8 identical, glowing, full moon size,orange spheres, one sphere at a tme which first appeared in the same azimuth and performed the same course manuevers at the same velocity.

content.detailedDescription: Orange orb spotted hovering for a period of 10-15 min before it assumed a southward flight path until leaving view, object appeared to be moving in all directions while moving away. these lights are coming around fairly often at least 2-3 times a week and that is just what i notice maybe everyday i will have to pay closer attention. some orbs appear to pulse to different color briefly when they are close but hold a bright star like color when in the distance this i why i have noticed it, i thought it was the north star or something but compass on my phone said se and stars don't fly around. definitely not a plane i see planes at all times of the day around here and this thing is in no way shape or form a plane.
content.summary: Orange orb definately not plane there are a lot of planes flying over the area all the time i know what they should look like and this was not a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Seen on full moon night about 8pm from upper floor of apartment building looking west towards west hollywood - wla. at first thought to be the iss until seen through binoculars revealing long white-yellow cylindrical cigar shaped object. single red pulsating light observed at one end and what appeared to be a moving diagonal black stripe moving from right to left ruled out venus or fixed wing aircraft. brightness of object comparable to the full moon. too large to be any helicopter. lapd helicopter flew past going south within one mile 700 off deck no relation to hovering object. object appeared to be 75-100 ft or more in length. distance from object 3-7 miles. no black silhouette visible to suggest blimp or modern day nt zeppelin object hovered for one hour before moving west for undetermined distance then returning to previous hover location then moving out of sight. object bore resemblance to known sighting footage taken in last ten years. witnessed with two other observers, the "creep factor" was present.
content.summary: Bright cigar like object with pulsating light hovered in place over west la.

content.detailedDescription:
8-19-2013 approximately 11:00 pm mst i was sitting on my sofa watching television. centennial airport is approximately three miles nne from my home.  we see and hear planes landing and departing from our home daily and can distinguish planes from stars or other objects in the sky. from my sofa i noticed a bright object appear and remain stationary. at first i ignored the object however the object remained stationary and from my maked eye i could see pulsating light and suddenly a light or beam shot flashed down from the object.  i then went outside looking west and viewed the object. the object appeared more birlliantly than from inside my home. i went inside and asked my wife for binoculars and shared what i saw.  my wife then followed me outside so we could see the object together sharing the use of the bincoulars.  i then went inside and found my sons telescope and returned outside and used that while my wife used the binoculars.  we viewed the object simultaneously. each providing almost similar descriptions. i then retrieved an old digital camera and took photos of the object. i watched the object for nearly 40 minutes. the object did appear to move further west.  to determine if it had moved at all i returned to my sofa and sat at the same postion where i first observed the object.  the object did move wnw and slighly lower to 25 degrees above the horizon from my vantage point.

as i write this description i uploaded the photos and they are very poor in quality. i don't know if i missed the object or not but the photos do not provide detail of the object.  now that i think about it i did use the flash. not the brightest photographer.
content.summary: Stationary red green-blue white pulsating obnject

content.detailedDescription:
This is my first ever ufo experience. i considered ufo's to be plausible, but did not yet believe in them.
i was in bed, awake. i was meditating, and trying to force my emotions into a state of bliss. i had been contemplating whether generating such strong emotions within myself could affect the physical world, such as causing healing.
i got up to use the toilet, and afterwards, went to the back door and looked out. i had done this on a number of occasions on other nights, but had never seen anything. i must admit, i had hoped to.
a few moments later, i saw a group of lights that were flashing randomly. they were all part of something - definitely grouped together, not separate entities, so i consider them to be a single ufo. they looked as though they could have been on a disc shaped object, but it was difficult to tell.
the ufo travelled in a straight line in an easterly direction. it went behind the treeline to the north. after about 30 seconds, it vanished.
then another appeared, this one travelled north, then it vanished as well.
i waited a few minutes to see if they were any more, but none appeared so i went back to bed.
these ufo's did not display the characteristic flashing lights as seen on any conventional aircraft.
it was difficult to tell what size or how high these were. i would say they were neither at very high altitude or at very low altitude. the distance travelled across the sky and the amount of time it took suggested they were travelling very fast.
i wasn't shocked or frightened when they appeared. i had a sense something inevitable had simply been confirmed.
it struck me that this occurred at precisely the time i was stood looking out my back door, that both ufo's appeared perfectly in my field of vision and that it followed a period of meditation.
content.summary: 2 series of randomly flashing lights that appeared, traveled in a straight line, then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: My husband first witnessed this light like object,on a wed night while i was at work he told me about it when i came home,we live in country area so stars are very visible,but it was much much lower than a star,maybe 400 ft above trees,then the following satmy urday night we,my husband,myself and my mom were all sitting on the front porch around 9:00 pm,when two very low planes flew past,we commented on how low and close to each other they were,not a minute later the low hovering light was there,it when up then down and faded out,and tonight 8-19-2013, while at work i was taking trash out to the dumpster and i noticed this bright light again,i grabbed my phone to take a picture,but before i could it faded out,and i only work about 3 miles from my home. we also believe we seen it again on the way home one night in the past two weeks,we live on elvis presley lake and have seen strange blue,and sometimes green meteorlike objects in the sky above the lake,they seem to fall into the water,but make no waves or splash,this has happened many times in the past few years while out fishing late at night,these have been seen by our friends fishing with us as well,my husband thinks these current lights may be military drones,i'm not sure,but it seems very strange
content.summary: Very low star like bright light appears,then bounces up and down then light fades in and out

content.detailedDescription:
My daughters and i were leaving our community pool at 9pm on august 18,2013.  as we walked away, one daughter noticed two objects in the sky coming our direction.  although it was a full moon, there were a few clouds blocking the light; and whether because the sky was dark, or because the objects were, or both, we could not see a definite shape to them, only a red light in a star burst shape on the bottom.  based on the shape of the lights though, i would guess the objects were round, and about 30 feet across.  initially they both flew parallel to one another, at about the altitude of a small, single engine aircraft or helicopter (maybe 500 feet in altitude).  neither made any noise, and we didn't notice any kind of vapor trail or other lights.   

because several large trees were blocking our view, we crossed the street.  as the approached our position, the distance between the objects widened.  when they were within a couple hundred feet of being directly overhead, the object on the right stopped completely and hovered, while the object on the left continued forward.  within seconds of stopping, the lights on the hovering object faded - similar to how light bulbs fade on a dimmer switch, until the light was almost, but not quite extinguished.  this took 30 seconds at most, and at that point, the object began to drift back along the course it had flown.  it was not moving as swiftly as it went backwards as it had when it came forwards, and the lights were so dim, i had to squint to see them. 

within less than a minute of the lights nearly disappearing on the first object, the lights of the second object faded the same way.  the lights on both objects remained in this "barely there" state for about 15 to 30 seconds and then disappeared completely.  at that point we could not see either object well enough to tell if they flew away, and in which direction.  oddly though, a dog in the neighborhood; which had started barking as the lights approached directly overhead the pool, stopped when the lights disappeared completely.  we did not see any other planes in the area at the time, but approximately five minutes later, a small plane flew somewhat low, overhead.  it did not circle or hover however, so i'm uncertain as to whether it was connected to the appearance of the objects, or not.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects with red lights in a starburst pattern flew parallel slowly overhead, then seperated. within seconds the lights faded on one object, then the other.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: To give a better idea of the area, i am right near ucf and out west from here is the executive airport; it is not uncommon to see many planes flying in an east/west fashion here. i was on my back porch grilling and noticed a light hanging in the sky, off toward the west. initially i thought "far off plane, no big deal." i suppose it must have seemed a little strange when i first spotted in retrospect, because i remember thinking "i am going to watch this thing move, it's certainly a plane." well, what originally looked like landing lights began to seem a little less so the longer the thing held it's position and size in the air. the thing was hovering and sort of pulsating and possibly rotating at times. the light would change from red to blue to white to greenish almost randomly, but at times would seem to follow a sequence as well. it was slowly descending over the 30-40 minute period, sometimes making abrupt motions. overall, its motions were slow though.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating red/white/blue/green light spotted in orlando

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a rural area about 40 km north of toronto. i always sit on my deck and love watching the sky.I first viewed this object 3 summer's ago. at that time i was looking east and seen this object move from behind a very tall pine tree, but it is very far away. as i watched it went out of view behind the pine tree, and then re-appeared. the white and red lights it emitted seemed to be turning, and blinking. i actually was quite amazed and thought that this can not be a satellite. it would take a dip, move left then right,
and seemed like it was hovering in between movements. it would rest for about 10 seconds and repeat it's movements. it also moved in a diagonally path.
it stayed in the east and travelled southward, i would lose view of it  shortly before dawn. i felt very excited, and also shocked. my heart rate increased only because i could not believe what i was seeing. i have shown relatives this event, and they also were quiet amazed. i would try to convince them to try to stay awake until 4am so they could witness how much larger it seemed, and how you could see the lights flashing more prominently also it's movements that were more visual at that time. the exact date is what i am referring to as my last sighting. i have been watching this for quiet some time, actually the last three summer's.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Comes into view around 1:30am, at 4:30am closer and more prominent. it moves in all directions and blinks.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my back porch i saw what looked like a star moving slowly across the sky but quicker than usual while at a steady pace. it started in the west and moved to the east (over the course of 1-3 minutes) at what looked like a higher altitude than a plane but maybe a satellite but what convinced me it wasn't a satellite was when it went to the east and slowly disappeared, losing its glow and turning into a pinpoint of a light before disappearing. i witnessed this myself while my girlfriend and one of my best friends walked to the store together. when they got back they, without me asking or prompting them, asked me if i had seen the same thing.
content.summary: Moved slowly, highly across sky like a star, curved then slowly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was on a flight from chicago o'hare intl to mc carran las vegas,aisle 12 just in front of the planes wing,  about 10 minutes after take off and as the plane continued to gain altitude (seat belt light still on) i and a few passengers aisles 11,12,13 left side of the plane saw what appeared at first another plane that was so close it was going to hit us. it startled us, the object hovered, it spun in a circle motion and wobbled then quickly ascended above us. there were rain delays for departing planes and there were about 20 planes ahead of us waiting to take off, and several behind us lined up on the runways that we could see,so naturally i thought omg another plane. i was extremely frightened as i thought we were going to collide, as i continued to stare in horror i realized that this object was not an airplane. at first there appeared to be a mist or fog around this object, the sky at this time was sunny and was becoming cloudless. it was startling, but since we could not use our cell phones, none of us was able to obtain a photo. the object did not shine in the sunlight, it appeared to be metallic and grey and it had several circular "lights" around its edges in a line horizontal line formation, it paused at it approached and seem to just hover or be totally still, then zoomed upward. ufo or drone? i am convinced and my initial reaction was that i had just seen a ufo in broad daylight.
content.summary: Object witnessed in daylight by several passengers shortly after takeoff.

content.detailedDescription: Very bright  white disk/circular object traveling at a snails pace through the night sky... the evening sky was clear and there was no obvious light pollution. i was sitting with my youngest grandson (9 yrs old) on the chehalis river when i noticed movement in sky. i had my binoculars with me as we were waiting to view the perseid meteor shower. i grabbed my binoculars immediately as i knew it wasn't a conventional aircraft..I live in maple ridge bc and live on a major flight path so i'm super familiar with aircraft, i'm a star gazer and have been for the last 4 years, so i've grown accustomed to seeing satellites,  aircraft and meteor's... something about the way it was moving, its like it was observing, right away i noticed there was no beacon lights on the  top or bottom, no blinking of any kind!! also the object was moving very slowly, i had time to look at it, pass the binoculars to my grandson and let him view it!! its movement was unlike anything i've ever seen in the night sky...Smooth, slow and no sound....I continued to watch it until it flew  in a straight line until it went out of sight behind a row of trees and out of view....
content.summary: Very bright  white disk/circular object traveling at a snails pace through the night sky while we sat on the chehalis river...

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside enjoying the night air, smoking a cigar.  i live near willow run airport and also detroit metro is a few miles down the road.  i'm used to seeing planes in the sky at varying altitudes.  it's hard to judge how high up the light was, but based on previous experiences with planes, i should have been able to hear it, but i didn't.  at night, even when planes are at their highest, i am still able to see con-trails and blinking lights.  

i first noticed the light coming from a north/northeastern direction heading south/southwest.  i figured it was another airplane.  however, as stated above, as it got closer overhead, i noticed the lack of noise and faa lights.  it didn't occur to me to grab my camera, i was just in awe that i was actually witnessing this.  if i had went to get my camera, it would have been gone by the time i got back.  

the "object" appeared to be solid light, with no distinguishable features.  as it was traveling the light started to flutter, then suddenly dimmed out to a dull red color, and after after a few seconds, it vanished completely.  

i was searching and searching but could not find the light, it was gone.  however, something else happened...  as i was searching the skies, i saw another light in the sky.  it was not as bright, but it did the exact same thing.  it was moving north to south, the light dimmed, then vanished.  this all seemed to happen right above where i live.

after the initial shock wore off, i began to feel a bit uneasy, almost as if i felt a change in that atmosphere.  i didn't even finish my cigar, i put it out and went back inside.
content.summary: First appeared to be a plane.  however, no faa lights, completely silent, and it changed from bright white to a dim red color before dissappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Was in back yard watching fire work display off in the distance due east , after watching display just hanging out looking out over the expansive view we have , when from behind us coming from south west strange white sphere disk like shape light flew over hovered for split second then took of quickly ,then light evaporated , i thought the object took off afterward straight up , my wife said it disappeard ,there also seems to be differences in the height of the object and size , i say it was very high in the sky ,she says it was just above the tree line i say it was very large because it was high in the sky , she says it was the size of a tennis ball, needless to say we both witnessed some thing strange the night of aug 17 2013 at around 10:30pm , i guess you can say or reaction after the event was in wonder or disbelief or shock we just kept asking each other did you see that, we had noticed the object because there wasn't any choice it just flew right above us, it wasn't bright like shooting star white more like a glowing haze to it, but we know what plane and helicopter lights look like , we have an airport near our home , and it wasn't a spot light , this event only lasted seconds , but was extremely weird , just feel like i had to tell someone , this is like nothing i've ever seen before i wish i could draw it on paper , so i could show you , we have a tremendous view from our back yard and the sky is expansive, i guess it was only a matter of time before , one of us would see something , i am fascinated buy this event , my wife however is not and wishes she never saw it, thanks for letting me vent , this is really freaking me out
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Standing in yard object came over us from sw hovered for second took of rapidly east then light vanished i thought i saw it shoot straight up after light went out my wife said it just vanished to her

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck, when i witnessed three geese moving left to right in a line not a standard v pattern as they got closer i realized they where not geese and then joined into a solid ball.... they did this once more before rocketing upwards out of sight . before they first joined  there was a two foot gap between them
content.summary: Looked like three gease became one the broke apart became one again then flew straight up ....Did not follow standard v formation

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i live in north east columbus, ohio. on the night of august 17 2013, we were sitting on our patio at the back of the house which faces north. as we observed the moon we saw an aircraft light and heard the noise of the engines dissipate as it traveled away from us further north. suddenly my wife exclaimed that she could see 'another fireball' over the trees in the same general location. (apparently she had seen one a month prior.) as i followed her gaze i could see a bright orange/red sphere slowly moving above the trees and towards my right (west). as we watched this sphere pass, two additional spheres appeared of the same color. they formed something of a triangular formation and continued along the ne to sw path. no noise could be heard. they were moving slowly and did not change course nor change size/color. it seemed that the front of the spheres were more red and the rear more orange - almost as if they were on fire. we made our way to the front of the house to track the lights and then saw an additional set of three spheres emerge above the trees following the same course as the first set. there were six spheres total. we continued to watch as they traveled slowly out of sight behind the neighbor's trees. we live close to the airport and are used to seeing aircraft lights and the police/medical helicopters that frequently pass overhead, as well as the noises they create. however, we heard no noises from these lights. i offered to my wife that perhaps these were military flares used for exercises but we didn't see or hear any planes or helicopters chasing these lights and flares (as far as we know) don't fly. very strange sight to behold. unfortunately, we did not have the presence of mind to try to record this event. it only lasted about five minutes.
content.summary: Fireball like spheres moving ne to sw over columbus, oh

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my stoop with a friend on the upper eastside of manhattan on lexington ave looking north about 11pm notice 6 bright lights then 3 dissapeared and  3 remained in a wish bone posion i notice bottom orb was moving up and down in short distance the other on right was pulsading and changing colors white on the outside blue green on the inside and started moving slowly east and then would stop i ask my friend if those were helicopters no he said no noise what so ever than i asked him are they flares iknew that they were neither or but i just wanted to be corrected i did video tape a little of it on my phone for the next 2-3 days it was baffeling me and driving me crazy i can tell you whati didn't see
i contacted 2 news channels no reports of lights in the sky i remebered their was a boating accident up at the tappan zee bridge i was wandering if the police had used flares that night. that boating accident was all over the news  no flares were used just spot lights confirmed. i had to do my own investigating these lights left me puzzeled and nothing was mentioned on tv or media. however a friend told me to check out mufon on web i'm glad i did! i did some research on the event database and that on that night many other witnesses saw the same thing with good video footage from connectict new jersey long island and upstate new york i'm satisfy to an extend but more needs to be investigated about those lights  not! from this planet i don't think now.
content.summary: Saw 6 ligths hovering changing colors then only 3 dissapeared  started to wobble than move slowly east

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were up at mt  antero, gold parnning when i decided to take some pictures of the area. according to the gps we were about 12 thousand,tree line. i took 3 or 4 pictures of the mt antero and the meadow. we proceeded to head down the trail taking more pictures of a beautiful stream th���t follows the atv trail. when i got home later th���t night( colorado springs) i reviewed the pictures i had taken' when i noticed the dark dull object in the picture.  i asked my friend if he saw or heard any noise, we both looked over the photo and don't remember seeing or hearing it before i took the photo. we can only estimate the object to be above 13 thousand feet. we were 12 thousand. i've lived in colorado all my life and have never seen anything i couldn't explaine. when we try to blow up the photo,it looks like there ���s a glow around it and its oblong.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of mt antero,looked at pictures laterin the day,when i saw this oject in the upper left hsbd corner.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were up at mt  antero, gold parnning when i decided to take some pictures of the area. according to the gps we were about 12 thousand,tree line. i took 3 or 4 pictures of the mt antero and the meadow. we proceeded to head down the trail taking more pictures of a beautiful stream th���t follows the atv trail. when i got home later th���t night( colorado springs) i reviewed the pictures i had taken' when i noticed the dark dull object in the picture.  i asked my friend if he saw or heard any noise, we both looked over the photo and don't remember seeing or hearing it before i took the photo. we can only estimate the object to be above 13 thousand feet. we were 12 thousand. i've lived in colorado all my life and have never seen anything i couldn't explaine. when we try to blow up the photo,it looks like there ���s a glow around it and its oblong.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of mt antero,looked at pictures laterin the day,when i saw this oject in the upper left hsbd corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a golf corse called the highlands of elgin, it was mid morning, close to 11:00 am. i was ready to tie up my ball, when a disc metallic object caught my eye, it was easy to spot as there where no clouds, there was clear skies all round us. i stayed looking at it and decided to take a picture. it stayed standing at an altitude of about 200 ft and after 40 seconds it ascended rapidly until no longer visible.  the object was clearly metallic, when i got home and i was able to zoom in the picture you can see that it looks more cylinder like but still have disc shape. i initially thought it was either a ballon or a remote controlled craft, i knew it wasn't a plane. it was to small, to close and flighting to low to be one. plus i'm use to see airplanes in the area all the time as elgin is an approaching direction to o'hare international airport. at this point, i can't say exactly what it could be, just that it went up extremely fast and disappear. after that happened my heart was beating really fast.
content.summary: I was playing golf with a friend and notice the disc like object and observe it for a while. it was stationary and it was reflecting light. after 40 seconds it ascended rapidly and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car with a friend waiting for another friend on the corner of s anza st and east main st i opened the sunroof to the car to smoke a cigarette and first i saw a very dim white object moving slowly across the sky thats what caught my attention at first. i thought the first object was a plane but i dont know but then i saw a object at first it looked like a police helicopter with red and blue flashing lights then i noticed that it was not even close to a helicopter because of the movement the object was doing in the sky.. it started going super fast in a crazy line up and down left and right in a matter of seconds! i was stunned and i could not believe what i was witnessing and i asked my friend if he just saw the same thing i saw and he was shocked that he had seen what i had just seen.. the object keep flying around the el cajon sky and after 30 minutes the object started moving towards space and you could still see the red and blue light from it it just kept going further and further toward space... after an hour i left and i tried to go to the nearest hill/mountain to see if it was still visible we drove to mt helix in la mesa, ca but the object was too far in space but you could still see the red and blue light that was coming from the object
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red and blue light hovered over el cajon, ca

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a now deceased friend were out cruising on a back country road somewhere between laurel and connersville,indiana.We had stopped to use the restroom.After getting out of the truck my friend said look a flying saucer pointing to a light in the sky.I had just finished my tour of duty with the u.S.A.F.Security police and trying to impress him and started to explain why it was not a ufo.Both of us became in grossed in watching the light that travelled from one side of the horizon to the other.First that night there was dead silence,one of those nights were sound travels.We could hear cars in the distance but see no lights anywhere.The object that passed over made no sound.A helicopter or light planes engine should have been heard as it passed by us.The object seemed to move to slow for a copter or plane it just seemed to drift slowly.During the sighting my friend and i did not speak till the object was out of sight.Afterwards we jumped back in the truck just sitting there being silent.My friend then looked at me and said when that thing passed by the moon did you see a( and before he could finish i said a dome).My friend then got two sheets of scrap paper and said draw what you saw and ill do the same.The drawing were almost exactly the same except the angle of view.After this we discussed this just a little trying to figure out the one diffence on the objects lights.We then went home and althought we always got together every week ne never spoke to anyone else about our experience not friend nor lover or co-workers.It was not for fear of ridicule we just shut up about it for at least a year.At this point it sounds like an average report until one night while rehashing the incident together we both realized that we saw the object from a distance that was to far away to see all the details we described and both drew on the paper.And to this day i have been haunted by this experience.It never goes a way for any length of time.Ive always want to be regressed to relive the experience.Gentleman i have to sign off for not in at work using their computer,i know this report is almost forty years old but its like yesterday to me.Last but not least i was a trained observer in usaf since then ive worked for two local police organizations im not a nut and and the description of the object will if contacted amaze you.There are no known planes the have this lighting pattern.
content.summary: Fly by of ufo and possible loss of time.

content.detailedDescription: My truck was facing south on nooney st. poplar bluff mo. on my way to work on aug 9 at 5:28.  as i reached for the door handle i looked up and thought to myself wow the moon is bright, definitely full.  entering the truck i thought to myself the moon should be close to new moon phase now.  so i looked up through the windshield to confirm.   yes,  that's the moon alright, and it's full. a couple of minutes later (approx. 4 blocks) as i turned on to main st. i had an unobstructed view of a perfect crescent moon.  i continued driving to work another mile or so then i thought, wait,  if i see the crescent moon now what was the light i thought was the full moon? i thought... there was no sound, there was no movement. strange, very strange.
content.summary: Thought i was looking at full moon.  driving to work four blocks later in a diferent direction saw cresent moon?

content.detailedDescription: Sunday, august 18th 2013 (approx. 9:15pm) my girlfriend and i were driving south on bel aire drive. i came to the stop sign at the intersection of manor road when i immediately saw three very bright red-orange orbs in the sky directly infront of me. i cannot be sure their altitude or size but they were certainly above the tree line and below the clouds. the orbs were arranged in a triangular formation and remained still during my observation. it was rather cloudly out and no other stars could be observed (they were by far the brightest thing in the sky). the orbs appeared to be hovering right above route 22. after watching for a minute or two i made a right turn onto manor drive and my girlfriend looked back and could no longer see them as if they had vanished.
content.summary: Three bright red-orange orbs in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: One night i was just looking at the stars off of my porch and i saw what looked to be a triangular constellation but upon further inspection the "stars" were blinking in an unusual pattern. the craft hovered for awhile and the ascended in a path north and the ultra speed and dissapeared
content.summary: Triangle with random light pattern that sort of light like morse code

content.detailedDescription: Sightings wen sightings report olines be gas sightings report
content.summary: Beskos flyings over sightings

content.detailedDescription: While shopping, at what was then farmer jacks supermarket, i,along with at least 8-12 people in parking lot, observed a metallic disc shaped object move in a triangular pattern. craft was not of earthly origin, as i have studied ufos pretty exstensively. disc shaped craft was about 5000 ft.{i was an airborne ranger in the army } day was cloudless, craft covered distances of 100+ miles in the blink of an eye. three times it did this, before it disappeared without any of us on the ground actually seeing it leave.....But i know that it did not disappear,it accelerated away at an unbelievable speed.Of which was, and is unatianable by mankind. as this would exzert g forces inconcieveable to science.....Area 51 you say,mmmmmmmmm !Make no mistake about it, out government is by far, the leader in techniclogical innovation,in any given area....Of science fiction & science fact. remember harrison fords role as indiana jones; at the entrance of a government werehouse, filled with crates far as the eye could see??????????You can,t handle the truth.  p/s i was in the store checking out and noticed people looking up skyward while in the check out lane.My date&year might be off,but i know what i saw,i cannot be told different, that whati observed, was a man made object. if it were man made,our pilots would not blackout during hi-g manuvers...You better ask somebody.....Me!
content.summary: Astounding and incredible, to say the least............................................
